conceal.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The shadows concealed her as she crept up to the house.
The path was concealed by long grass.
conceal.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to hide your real feelings or the truth
conceal.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: She tried to conceal the fact that she was pregnant.
She was taking drugs and trying to conceal it from me.
